dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1791 IS: To amend the Delta Development Act to include Vernon and Sabine parishes in the definition of the term “Lower Mississippi”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Vitter (for himself and Mr. Cassidy) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Delta Development Act to include Vernon and Sabine parishes in the definition of the term Lower Mississippi.

section.text: Section 4(2)(D) of the Delta Development Act (42 U.S.C. 3121 note; Public Law 100–460) is amended by inserting Vernon, Sabine, after Webster.
